answerText: chirality[10] The letters R and S are used to denote types of a chiral molecule that possess the "stereo" form of this relationship. This relationship's "structural" form is possessed by n-butane and 2-methylpropane.
heading: MUT |2014 | 3 | 10 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The cholesteric mesophase is a type of nematic phase with this property. For 10 points each: [10] Name this property possessed by 1-chloro-1-bromo-1-fluoroethane, in which a molecule is not superimposable on its mirror image.
